activities.name: Copy Quantum SYS_COMPANIES Table to Staging

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT SYS_COMPANIES.SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
,SYS_COMPANIES.SDF_SYSCM_001
,SYS_COMPANIES.COMPANY_NAME
,SYS_COMPANIES.COMPANY_ID
,SYS_COMPANIES.ADDRESS1
,SYS_COMPANIES.ADDRESS2
,SYS_COMPANIES.ADDRESS3
,SYS_COMPANIES.CITY
,SYS_COMPANIES.STATE
,SYS_COMPANIES.ZIP_CODE
,SYS_COMPANIES.COUNTRY
,SYS_COMPANIES.SHIP_NAME
,SYS_COMPANIES.FAA_NUMBER
,SYS_COMPANIES.GLA_EQUITY
FROM TESTENV.SYS_COMPANIES

SELECT GEO_AUTO_KEY
, GEO_CODE
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_GEO_001
FROM TESTENV.GEO_CODES

SELECT COC_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, COUNTRY_NAME
FROM TESTENV.COUNTRY_CODES

dependsOn.activity: Copy Quantum SYS_COMPANIES Table to Staging

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT DIV_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, SDF_DIV_001
, DIVISION_NAME
FROM TESTENV.DIVISION

SELECT GLS_AUTO_KEY
, SEGMENT_NUMBER
, ACCOUNT
, DESCRIPTION
, ACCOUNT_TYPE
, ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC
, SDF_GLS_002
FROM TESTENV.GL_SEGMENT

SELECT GAC_AUTO_KEY
, GAC_PARENT
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, ACCOUNT_TYPE
, SEQ
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_GAC_001
, COSTOFGOODS_FLAG
, OTHER_INCOME_FLAG
, OTHER_EXPENSE_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.GL_ACCT_CAT

SELECT DPT_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, DIV_AUTO_KEY
, GLS_AUTO_KEY
, DEPT_NAME
, SDF_DPT_001
FROM TESTENV.DEPARTMENT

SELECT WOK_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
, SDF_WOK_003
, SDF_WOK_001
, SDF_WOK_002
, BILLING_RATE
FROM TESTENV.WO_SKILLS

SELECT GLA_AUTO_KEY
, ACCOUNT_NUMBER
, ACCOUNT_TYPE_DESC
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, GAC_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
, GLS_AUTO_KEY0
, GLS_AUTO_KEY1
, GLS_AUTO_KEY2
, GLS_AUTO_KEY3
, GLS_AUTO_KEY4
, LEDGER
, SEQ
, BUDGETED
, COSTOFGOODS_FLAG
, ALLOW_ENTRY
, REPLACEABLE
, OTHER_INCOME_FLAG
, OTHER_EXPENSE_FLAG
, CONTROL_ACCOUNT_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.GL_ACCOUNT

SELECT GLJ_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_JOURNAL

SELECT GLD_AUTO_KEY
, GLJ_AUTO_KEY
, GLA_AUTO_KEY
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_DISTRIBUTION

SELECT GLF_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, DESCRIPTION
FROM TESTENV.GL_FISCAL

SELECT GLP_AUTO_KEY
, GLF_AUTO_KEY
, FISCAL_START
, FISCAL_END
, GLP_FORWARD
, GLP_LAST
, IS_ACTIVE
, BUDGET_PERIOD
, FYE_PERIOD
FROM TESTENV.GL_PERIOD

SELECT CMP_AUTO_KEY
, COMPANY_CODE
, COMPANY_NAME
, COMPANY_ABBREV
, ADDRESS1
, ADDRESS2
, ADDRESS3
, CITY
, STATE
, ZIP_CODE
, COUNTRY
, SHIP_ADDRESS1
, SHIP_ADDRESS2
, SHIP_ADDRESS3
, SHIP_CITY
, SHIP_STATE
, SHIP_ZIP_CODE
, SHIP_COUNTRY
, SITE_CODE
, PHONE_NUMBER
, ALT_PHONE_NUMBER
, CUSTOMER_FLAG
, VENDOR_FLAG
FROM TESTENV.COMPANIES

SELECT SYSUR_AUTO_KEY
, EMPLOYEE_CODE
, USER_NAME
, USER_ID
, FIRST_NAME
, MIDDLE_NAME
, LAST_NAME
, EMAIL_ADDRESS
, START_DATE
, END_DATE
, BIRTH_DATE
, WOK_AUTO_KEY
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, GEO_AUTO_KEY
, PHONE_NUMBER
, LICENSE_TYPE
, LICENSE_NUMBER
, SYSUR_TA_SUPER
, OVER_TIME
, CONTRACTOR
, DPT_AUTO_KEY
, CMP_AUTO_KEY
FROM TESTENV.SYS_USERS

SELECT WTP_AUTO_KEY
, SDF_WTP_001
, TASK_TYPE
, DESCRIPTION
, BASE_TYPE
FROM TESTENV.WO_TASK_TYPE

SELECT ID
, SYSUR_AUTO_KEY
, EFFECTIVE_DATE
, RATE
, PERIOD
, VERSION
, DATE_CREATED
, CREATED_BY
, LAST_UPDATED
, UPDATED_BY
FROM MROUPG.SYS_USERS_RATE
WHERE DELETE_DATE IS NULL

SELECT ID
, CODE
, DESCRIPTION
, TYPE
, VERSION
, EXTERNAL_CODE
, SD_PAY_CODE
, SECONDARY_APPROVAL
, ABSENCE
, REQUIRES_ACCRUAL
, ACTIVE
FROM MROUPG.TIME_CODE

SELECT WOO.DPT_AUTO_KEY
, EDT.SYS_UR_AUTO_KEY
, EDT.WORK_DATE
, EDT.WOT_AUTO_KEY
, WTP_AUTO_KEY
, EDT.WOK_AUTO_KEY
, EDT.BILLABLE
, EDT.NON_BILLABLE
, EDT.GRAVY
, EDT.PROJECT_BILL
, EDT.PRJ_NB
, EDT.SUPPORT_BILL
, EDT.SUPPORT_NB
, EDT.IN_HOUSE_NON
, EDT.REWORK
, EDT.TRAINING
, EDT.DAMAGE
, EDT.NPT
FROM MROUPG.EFFICIENCY_DETAIL_TAB EDT
, TESTENV.WO_TASK WOT
, TESTENV.WO_OPERATION WOO
, TESTENV.WO_TASK_MASTER WTM
WHERE EDT.WOT_AUTO_KEY = WOT.WOT_AUTO_KEY
AND WOT.WOO_AUTO_KEY = WOO.WOO_AUTO_KEY
AND WOT.WTM_AUTO_KEY = WTM.WTM_AUTO_KEY
AND WORK_DATE >= TO_DATE('01/01/2018', 'MM/DD/YYYY')

SELECT DIV_AUTO_KEY
, SYSUR_AUTO_KEY
, POST_DATE
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, REG_HOURS
, OT_HOURS
, BER_HOURS
, CALLIN_HOURS
, JUR_HOURS
, HOL_HOURS
, PTO_HOURS
, VAC_HOURS
FROM MROUPG.DIVISION_PAY_POSTINGS
WHERE POST_DATE >= TO_DATE('01/01/2018', 'MM/DD/YYYY')

activities.name: Copy Quantum DIVISION_WORKED_HOURS
activities.description:
SELECT DIV_AUTO_KEY
, SYS_UR_AUTO_KEY
, WORK_DATE
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, SUPPORT_CODE
, TOTAL_DIV_HOURS
, USER_DAY_HOURS
FROM MROUPG.DIVISION_WORKED_HOURS
WHERE WORK_DATE >= TO_DATE('01/01/2018', 'MM/DD/YYYY')

source.oracleReaderQuery:
SELECT DIV_AUTO_KEY
, SYS_UR_AUTO_KEY
, WORK_DATE
, SYSCM_AUTO_KEY
, SUPPORT_CODE
, TOTAL_DIV_HOURS
, USER_DAY_HOURS
FROM MROUPG.DIVISION_WORKED_HOURS
WHERE WORK_DATE >= TO_DATE('01/01/2018', 'MM/DD/YYYY')
